table.name: vte_module_link_creator
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_module_link_creator` ( `id` INT(19) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` TINYINT(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '// 0: delete; 1: enable; 2 disable', `created` DATETIME NOT NULL, `updated` DATETIME NOT NULL, `module_id` INT(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '// FK: with entityname table', `module_name` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, `module_label` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `module_type` TINYINT(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '// 1: entity; 2: extension', `module_fields` TEXT NULL, `module_list_view_filter_fields` TEXT NULL, `module_summary_fields` TEXT NULL, `module_quick_create_fields` TEXT NULL, `module_links` TEXT NULL, `description` TEXT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vte_module_link_creator_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vte_module_link_creator_settings` ( `id` int(19) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '// 0: delete; 1: enable; 2 disable', `created` datetime NOT NULL, `updated` datetime NOT NULL, `module_id` int(19) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '// FK - with entityname table', `description` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
